potential_duplicates.title: [MooreToCore] Support for StringType from moore to llvm dialect
potential_duplicates.match_reason: Directly discusses StringType support in MooreToCore conversion, same root cause area

potential_duplicates.title: [ImportVerilog] Cannot compile forward decleared string type
potential_duplicates.match_reason: Related to string type handling in Moore dialect, discusses similar conversion failures

primary_duplicate.notes: Issue #8332 is a feature request to support StringType in MooreToCore. Our crash is a symptom of the same missing support - string types are not properly handled during module port conversion.

recommendation_reason: The crash we found is a manifestation of the known issue #8332. The fix for #8332 (proper StringType support) would also fix our crash. Consider adding a comment to #8332 with our specific crash scenario (string port causing crash in getModulePortInfo).
